page.title: 06"Events" in Colemere area.
page.content: Survey of graves in churchyard,carried out by Lyneal Womens' Inst; survey booklet displayed permanently in church. Treasure hunt around Colemere followed by barbecue at vicarage in aid of church. Teddy Bears' Picnic in aid of Disabled Motorists,held in car park. Extension of Colemere car park. Opening of tea house at Bank House. Two weddings in church. Two christenings. Four funerals. Domesday (BBC) Survey. Christmas Midnight Communion. Harvest Festival Service. Carol Service and Nativity Play (Lyneal school children)
